verses.verse: Now this is the history of the generations <WH8435> of the sons <WH1121> of Noah <WH5146> and of Shem, <WH8035> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315> Sons <WH1121> were born <WH3205> to them after <WH310> the flood. <WH3999>
The sons <WH1121> of Japheth: <WH3315> Gomer, <WH1586> Magog, <WH4031> Madai, <WH4074> Javan, <WH3120> Tubal, <WH8422> Meshech, <WH4902> and Tiras. <WH8494>
The sons <WH1121> of Gomer: <WH1586> Ashkenaz, <WH813> Riphath, <WH7384> and Togarmah. <WH8425>
The sons <WH1121> of Javan: <WH3120> Elishah, <WH473> Tarshish, <WH8659> Kittim, <WH3794> and Dodanim. <WH1721>

Of these were the islands <WH339> of the nations <WH1471> divided in <WH6504> their lands, <WH776> everyone <WH376> after his language, <WH3956> after their families, <WH4940> in their nations. <WH1471>
The sons <WH1121> of Ham: <WH2526> Cush, <WH3568> Mizraim, <WH4714> Put, <WH6316> and Canaan. <WH3667>
The sons <WH1121> of Cush: <WH3568> Seba, <WH5434> Havilah, <WH2341> Sabtah, <WH5454> Raamah, <WH7484> and Sabteca. <WH5455> The sons <WH1121> of Raamah: <WH7484> Sheba <WH7614> and Dedan. <WH1719>
Cush <WH3568> became the father <WH3205> of Nimrod. <WH5248> He began <WH2490> to be <WH1961> a mighty one <WH1368> in the earth. <WH776>

He was a mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> before <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068> Therefore <WH3651> it is said, <WH559> "Like Nimrod, <WH5248> a mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> before <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068>"
The beginning <WH7225> of his kingdom <WH4467> was Babel, <WH894> Erech, <WH751> Accad, <WH390> and Calneh, <WH3641> in the land <WH776> of Shinar. <WH8152>
Out of that land <WH776> he went <WH3318> into Assyria, <WH804> and built <WH1129> Nineveh, <WH5210> Rehoboth <WH7344>- Ir, <WH5892> Calah, <WH3625>
and Resen <WH7449> between Nineveh <WH5210> and Calah <WH3625> (the same is the great <WH1419> city <WH5892>).
Mizraim <WH4714> became the father <WH3205> of Ludim, <WH3866> Anamim, <WH6047> Lehabim, <WH3853> Naphtuhim, <WH5320>
Pathrusim, <WH6625> Casluhim <WH3695> (which the Philistines <WH6430> descended <WH3318> from <WH3732>), and Caphtorim.
Canaan <WH3667> became the father <WH3205> of Sidon <WH6721> (his firstborn <WH1060>), Heth, <WH2845>
the Jebusite, <WH2983> the Amorite, <WH567> the Girgashite, <WH1622>
the Hivite, <WH2340> the Arkite, <WH6208> the Sinite, <WH5513>
the Arvadite, <WH721> the Zemarite, <WH6786> and the Hamathite. <WH2577> Afterward <WH310> the families <WH4940> of the Canaanites <WH3669> were spread abroad. <WH6327>

The border <WH1366> of the Canaanites <WH3669> was from Sidon, <WH6721> as you go <WH935> toward Gerar, <WH1642> to Gaza; <WH5804> as you go <WH935> toward Sodom, <WH5467> Gomorrah, <WH6017> Admah, <WH126> and Zeboiim, <WH6636> to Lasha. <WH3962>
These are the sons <WH1121> of Ham, <WH2526> after their families, <WH4940> after their languages, <WH3956> in their lands, <WH776> in their nations. <WH1471>
To Shem, <WH8035> the father <WH1> of all the children of Eber, <WH5677> the elder <WH1419> brother <WH251> of <WH1419> Japheth, <WH3315> to him also were children born. <WH3205>
The sons <WH1121> of Shem: <WH8035> Elam, <WH5867> Asshur, <WH804> Arpachshad, <WH775> Lud, <WH3865> and Aram. <WH758>
The sons <WH1121> of Aram: <WH758> Uz, <WH5780> Hul, <WH2343> Gether, <WH1666> and Mash. <WH4851>
Arpachshad <WH775> became the father <WH3205> of Shelah. <WH7974> Shelah <WH7974> became the father <WH3205> of Eber. <WH5677>

To Eber <WH5677> were born <WH3205> two <WH8147> sons. <WH1121> The name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Peleg, <WH6389> for in his days <WH3117> the earth <WH776> was divided. <WH6385> His brother <WH251>'s name <WH8034> was Joktan. <WH3355>
Joktan <WH3355> became the father <WH3205> of Almodad, <WH486> Sheleph, <WH8026> Hazarmaveth, <WH2700> Jerah, <WH3392>
Hadoram, <WH1913> Uzal, <WH187> Diklah, <WH1853>
Obal, <WH5745> Abimael, <WH39> Sheba, <WH7614>
Ophir, <WH211> Havilah, <WH2341> and Jobab. <WH3103> All these were the sons <WH1121> of Joktan. <WH3355>
Their dwelling <WH4186> was from Mesha, <WH4852> as you go <WH935> toward Sephar, <WH5611> the mountain <WH2022> of the east. <WH6924>
These are the sons <WH1121> of Shem, <WH8035> after their families, <WH4940> after their languages, <WH3956> in their lands, <WH776> after their nations. <WH1471>

These are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Noah, <WH5146> after their generations, <WH8435> in their nations. <WH1471> Of these were the nations <WH1471> divided <WH6504> in the earth <WH776> after <WH310> the flood. <WH3999>
